body_html: It looks like this bug is fixed in master but not in TF 1.0. So I would recommend running with config = tf.ConfigProto(graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(optimizer_options=tf.OptimizerOptions(opt_level=tf.OptimizerOptions.L0))) until TF 1.1 is released
body_text: It looks like this bug is fixed in master but not in TF 1.0. So I would recommend running with config = tf.ConfigProto(graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(optimizer_options=tf.OptimizerOptions(opt_level=tf.OptimizerOptions.L0)))  until TF 1.1 is released
body:
It looks like this bug is fixed in master but not in TF 1.0. So I would recommend running with `config = tf.ConfigProto(graph_options=tf.GraphOptions(optimizer_options=tf.OptimizerOptions(opt_level=tf.OptimizerOptions.L0)))
` until TF 1.1 is released
